lore: Thanks to his magical abilities, his great intelligence and his wiles, Taylor was ruling over his home town by the time he turned 20. For a long time, the city prospered. Despite the numerous rumors about Taylor's strange hobbies, no one wanted to investigate him or ask him to step down. Centuries later, this city would become the capital of the kingdom of Caedo.\n\nThe Vital Clutcher usually grabs its victims' legs, consuming their life energy to weaken them and make them fall on their knees.
menagerieDialog: (It's giving you a thumbs-up. It must enjoy killing other creatures.)
(It's raising its middle finger and displaying it to you and all your creatures. While this may seem childish, you admit to yourself that you'd do the same thing if your body was a giant hand.)
(It's impatiently tapping the floor with its fingertips.)
(It's gently stroking one of your other creatures with a single finger. Creepy.)
(It skitters away, walking on its fingers to make a disconcerting clattering sound.)
name: Vital Clutcher
